about_the_game:
This is an idle game.

Game background introduction:
In this world rich in medieval European style, players will embark on an adventure full of adventures and challenges. This strange city, a strange land, is full of opportunities and dangers. The city is located in the medieval European landscape, and its architecture, culture and customs are full of history.
Acquisition of resources and recruitment in tavern:
In this city, resources are the key to survival. Players can obtain resources by hanging up and waiting, but they can also recruit various heroic heroes in the tavern. They will become your loyal partners and help you face various challenges.
Improve reputation:
To gain a foothold in this city, you need to continuously improve your visibility in the city. Completing bounties, solving problems of city residents, and protecting the city from threats will help increase your reputation in the city. When your popularity reaches a certain level, the city's leaders will recognize your value and allow you to participate in the development of the town.
Urban development:
When your popularity reaches a certain level, you will have the opportunity to start the town development mode. In this mode you can start developing and building your own town. You will be able to choose to build various buildings, recruit residents, and develop the city's economy and culture. Your town will become a thriving medieval stronghold, attracting residents and travelers of all types to create a city like no other.
